pages.title: Final Fractal
pages.text: $(li)The Final Fractal, forged with a $(l:patchouli:weapons/netherite_sword)Netherite Sword$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/witherite_ingot)Witherite Ingot$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/soul_heart)Soul Heart$(/l) is the second strongest sword.

pages.name: Final Fractal
pages.text: This weapon doesn't have durability and can't be burned by lava or fire.
